title: I didn't get my Border and Icon for silver.
body: And no I was not bronze last season.

replies.body:
Oh jeez, that sucks. >.<

If you DM us in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) about this, we'll get you in contact with one of our game specialists who can take a look at what happened.

Let me know if you have any questions.
Did u get any punishment like chat ban or leave booster if yes rip ur boarder
